fixes.name: Top N Filter
fixes.dax_expression:
VAR topN = SELECTEDVALUE('Top N'[Display As])
VAR rankValue = RANKX(
    ALL('test+'),
    CALCULATE(SUM('test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day])),
    ,
    DESC,
    DENSE
)
RETURN
rankValue <= topN
fixes.solution_explanation: Recreated the Tableau table calculation RANK(SUM([Likes_Received_Per_Day])) <= [Parameters].[Top N] in DAX. Used RANKX over ALL('test+') with CALCULATE(SUM('test+'[Likes_Received_Per_Day])) to compute the rank and SELECTEDVALUE('Top N'[Display As]) for the Tableau parameter. The measure returns TRUE when the rank is within the selected Top N.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation uses an aggregation and a table calculation (RANK) and references a Tableau parameter; per the rules it must be implemented as a measure.
